item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Don’t forget that some skills have skill modifiers inside the classes, so basically the modifier is being modified.

item.title: Pi xp rate
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

^ What he said.
In config.java you can add xp multipliers. Try messing about with them and see what you get. It’s a fun way of learning how something works.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

What source are you using?
If you are using a Trisidiax source, go into Config.java, and scroll all the way down to the bottom.

item.title: Pi xp rate
item.dc:creator: @i_pwn_u11 i_pwn_u1
item.description:
@i_pwn_u11 wrote:

[quote=“weednhoes, post:1, topic:508410”]Hey i need to cahnge my xp rates for skill, but i cant find how .My config.java :

[quote]public static final int MELEE_EXP_RATE = 200; // damage * exp rate
public static final int RANGE_EXP_RATE = 200;
public static final int MAGIC_EXP_RATE = 200;
public static final int EASY_MODE_EXP_RATE = 9999999;
public static final int MEDIUM_MODE_EXP_RATE = 1;
public static final int HARD_MODE_EXP_RATE = 1;
public static final int EXTREME_MODE_EXP_RATE = 1;
public static final double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;[/quote][/quote]
yo if u want to change ur skills xp rate u have to go down all down and u will see firemaking something like that ok
